dmca.title: No MP3s for Home Language Learners
dmca.body:
November 1, 2006

VIA FACSIMILE: [PRIVATE]
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam:

I write as counsel on behalf of Simon & Schuster, Inc., the publisher of the successful PIMSLEUR
